title: Project-Based Learning for Environmental Health to Enhance Ecological Intelligence

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic environmental science concepts and ability to utilize digital environmental resources
context.additional_context: Project progression centered on local environmental issue cases, utilizing collaborative tools (discussion boards, resource sharing) within LMS

learning_goals: Learners can analyze local environmental issues and design solutions by applying the PjBL-Ecopedagogy model.
Learners can quantitatively analyze the severity of environmental issues through ecological health indicator assessments.
Learners can plan environmental improvement projects with team members using digital collaboration tools and write implementation reports.
Learners can measure a 30% improvement in ecological intelligence quotient (EQ) through environmental health education.

resources: Local Environmental Dataset (Air Quality, Water Quality, Biodiversity, etc.)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
